prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Synth Pad, Drums, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Organ, Synth Pad, Drums, Guitar, and Chromatic Percussion, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Synth Pad, Drums, Guitar, and Chromatic Percussion, yet Piano is not included.

Style 3:
The instruments in this song are Organ, Synth Pad, Drums, Guitar, and Chromatic Percussion, omitting Piano.
